mapper.insert: insert into tb_user( id, user_pwd, user_name, gender, email, room_id, user_type )values( #{id}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{roomId}, #{userType} )
mapper.update: update tb_user set user_pwd=#{userPwd}, user_name=#{userName}, gender=#{gender}, email=#{email}, room_id=#{roomId}, user_type=#{userType} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from tb_user where user_name = #{userName} and user_pwd = #{userPwd} and user_type = #{userType}
select count(1) from tb_user where room_id = #{roomId}
select count(1) from tb_user where room_id like concat(#{buildingId}, '____')
